version_description:
Match of the Day - a handpicked opponent that gives users a starting boost in their next Prize Wheel.
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.

Feature Updates for v1.5.5!
- TILE COLLECTIONS: Customize your experience by collecting awesome, playable Scrabble Tiles!
- DUELS: It’s fast-paced, head-to-head Scrabble with limited time and turns. The more you win, the more prizes you’ll earn!
- MORE WORD GAMES: Show off your word skills in three new game modes: Word Drop, Tumbler, and Rush!
- BOOSTS: Each game mode has new and updated boosts to power your gameplay!
- LEAGUES: Earn Trophies in the Arena to move up in rank for bigger rewards.
- OPTIMIZATIONS: Additional bug fixes and game performance improvements

Feature Updates:
- NEW LEAGUE PERKS: Each League rank now grants special benefits!
- ARENA LEAGUES: Leagues received a makeover - all League ranks have updated names and new art!
- PERFORMANCE: Lots of bug fixes and game optimizations.
- DUELS: Fixed issues that caused the occasional match to crash or end abruptly.
- ARENA: Fixed a number of issues that could result in the game modes freezing or becoming unresponsive.

Lots of Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements!
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause the wrong turn status to display, leading to unexpected game resigns
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause active games to stop showing in the Lobby
-- Duels: Fixed bugs that could cause the match to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that could cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Shop: Fixed an issue preventing some players from seeing the purchase confirmation

Updated Look & Feel
-- Improved Player Profile, Match History, Inbox, Create Game view, and more!

Lots of Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements!
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause the wrong turn status to display, leading to unexpected game resigns
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause active games to stop showing in the Lobby
-- Duels: Fixed bugs that could cause the match to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that could cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Shop: Fixed an issue preventing some players from seeing the purchase confirmation
Updated Look & Feel
-- Improved Player Profile, Match History, Inbox, Create Game view, and more!

Lots of Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements!
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause the wrong turn status to display, leading to unexpected game resigns
-- Scrabble: Fixed bugs that could cause active games to stop showing in the Lobby
-- Duels: Fixed bugs that could cause the match to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that could cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Shop: Fixed an issue preventing some players from seeing the purchase confirmation
Updated Look & Feel
-- Improved Player Profile, Match History, Inbox, Create Game view, and more!

New performance improvements and more bug fixes!
-- Duels: Fixed several crash/freeze bugs that could occur during the match
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the round summary scoring to display inaccurately
Updated Look & Feel
-- Arena: New layout for the live and upcoming events list
-- Arena: New tournament event lobby layout to help make the game mode settings more clear

New performance improvements and more bug fixes!
-- Duels: Fixed several crash/freeze bugs that could occur during the match
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the round summary scoring to display inaccurately
Updated Look & Feel
-- Arena: New layout for the live and upcoming events list
-- Arena: New tournament event lobby layout to help make the game mode settings more clear

New performance improvements and more bug fixes!
-- Duels: Fixed several crash/freeze bugs that could occur during the match
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the game to freeze or end abruptly
-- Arena: Fixed bugs that would cause the round summary scoring to display inaccurately
Updated Look & Feel
-- Arena: New layout for the live and upcoming events list
-- Arena: New tournament event lobby layout to help make the game mode settings more clear

- Performance and stability improvements, bug fixes
- Better support for slower internet connections
- Better recovery support if disconnected during Arena games
- New tooltips to help guide you throughout the game
- Profile updated to include photo upload feature for guest players
- Privacy improvements: mute or block a player from their profile
- In Scrabble, long tap on a played word to view its definition
- Chat has a new look and improved functionality
- New rewards opportunities

- Fixed a number of bugs that could cause the game to crash, freeze, or end abruptly.
- Fixed a bug in Rush that caused tiles to appear in unexpected ways
- Fixed a number of display and visual issues throughout the game
- Improved support and handling of internet connectivity issues
- New: Weekly Challenges! Complete a set of objectives each week to earn a special reward!
- New: Scrabble Scholar! Improve your Scrabble skills by viewing the highest scoring moves from your previous turn
- New: Scrabble Club! Join the club to get these amazing benefits:
--- Removes ads for uninterrupted play
--- Unlock access to the Word Power Meter
--- Get unlimited uses of Scrabble Scholar
--- Earn rewards for each Challenge completed
--- Get an additional Arena Ticket each day
- Updated the Tiles section to highlight the latest collections
- Updated the Collins word dictionary

- Additional polish and updates to increase game performance
- Resolved visual issues for certain tablets and larger devices
- Fixed several bugs that could cause the game to crash, freeze, or end abruptly.
- Improved language localization support for French, Spanish, German, Italian, and Brazilian Portuguese
- Several usability enhancements to Chat
- More bug fixes and stability optimizations

- Additional polish and updates to increase game performance
- Resolved visual issues for certain tablets and larger devices
- Fixed several bugs that could cause the game to crash, freeze, or end abruptly.
- Improved language localization support for French, Spanish, German, Italian, and Brazilian Portuguese
- Several usability enhancements to Chat
- More bug fixes and stability optimizations

- Improved stability and performance for Duels and Arena games
- Fixed a bug that could cause Duels and Arena timers to go out of sync
- Added better handling for slower and lost internet connectivity
- New Feature! Earn bonus rewards for inviting friends and family
- Scrabble games on your turn that are expiring soon now show a warning indicator
- Fixed several bugs that could cause the game to crash, freeze, or end abruptly.
- More bug fixes and device optimizations

- Fixed a bug causing certain Scrabble game cards to show an incorrect turn status
- Fixed a bug affecting games that had the "Nudge" status
- Additional improvements and optimizations

We’re always improving to deliver the best Scrabble and word game experience!
- The Player Profile & Stats page has a fresh new look
- See how your stats rank against friends and other players
- New milestones have been added to help you track and celebrate your historic bests
- Additional visual polish and performance optimizations

We’re always improving to deliver the best Scrabble and word game experience!
- Added helpful tooltips to further assist new players
- Updated stat tracking for Scrabble Score and profile stats
- Easily find friends using the improved search feature
- Significant performance upgrades to Arena games and Duels
- Additional visual polish and gameplay optimizations

We’re always improving to deliver the best Scrabble and word game experience!
- New: Share your Scrabble Board!
--- Celebrate your Scrabble game moments, funny words, and close games.
--- Tap the new Share icon inside your Scrabble Games to try it out.
- Added a new Arena League Tier: Emerald! Compete to climb the ranks!
- Increased support for interrupted internet connectivity.
- Significant optimizations for Duels, Rush, and Tumbler gameplay.
- Addressed additional known issues.

We’re always improving to deliver the best Scrabble and word game experience!
- New shares added to for special moments:
--- Celebrate after scoring big plays in Scrabble
--- Share your match results in Scrabble and Duels
--- Show off Your Scrabble Score in your Profile
- Fixed several key bugs to improve game performance
- Addressed additional known issues

These exciting updates for Scrabble GO are now available!
- NEW - Sync Your Contact List: Connect your device’s Contact List to find and play with friends
- NEW - Climb the Social Leaderboards: Compete each week and compare your progress against your friends
- UPDATE - Play New Words: the Collins (English UK) and Larousse (French) dictionaries have been updated
- Additional polish, performance improvements, and bug fixes

Welcome to Scrabble GO, the new and updated version of the world’s favorite word game!

It’s the authentic Scrabble you know and love with a variety of new game modes to challenge all word game fans.

Scrabble GO Features:
- Classic Scrabble
- Official board, Tiles, and Dictionaries
- Play and chat with friends from around the world
- Practice against the computer
- Solo games like Tumbler, Word Drop, and Rush
- Quickfire Scrabble matches with Duels
- Collect unique and playable Scrabble tiles
- In-depth game stats and player profiles

Welcome Scrabble Fans, the latest update includes a number of improvements to make it easier to play your way!
- Classic mode and Play vs. Computer are more clear when starting a new game
- Improved visibility of the Word Dictionary selection
- Added the number of remaining tiles in the Scrabble menu
- Matchup screen now identifies your opponent if they are a Friend, Favorite, or Contact
- Updated the Contact List to simplify starting games with contacts
- Additional bug fixes and optimizations

We've made big improvements for new players and Scrabble veterans alike!
- New dictionary! The official NASPA Word List is now available.
- Updated the Start New Game screen to make gameplay selection more clear.
- Improved the layout and organization of the opponent selection screen.
- Added a new Friends icon in the Home lobby for quick access to Friends, Favorites, and Contacts.
- Additional bug fixes, performance improvements, and optimizations.

We've made big improvements for new players and Scrabble veterans alike!
- New dictionary! The official NASPA Word List is now available.
- Updated the Start New Game screen to make gameplay selection more clear.
- Improved the layout and organization of the opponent selection screen.
- Added a new Friends icon in the Home lobby for quick access to Friends, Favorites, and Contacts.
- Additional bug fixes, performance improvements, and optimizations.

Scrabble fans - our latest version includes many player-requested features and updates!
- Added Difficulty Selection when playing vs. the computer
- New Chat settings are available for improved privacy controls
- Added tile bag access when viewing the Scrabble game board
- Enhanced search to help you find Contacts more easily
- More polish, bug fixes, and performance improvements

Scrabble fans - our latest version includes many player-requested features and updates!
- Added Difficulty Selection when playing vs. the computer
- New Chat settings are available for improved privacy controls
- Added tile bag access when viewing the Scrabble game board
- Enhanced search to help you find Contacts more easily
- More polish, bug fixes, and performance improvements

Get ready to test your Scrabble skills and sharpen your keen puzzle minds!
- NEW FEATURE - Puzzle Path!
--- Play a series of challenging Scrabble puzzles to find high scoring words and win big
--- A fresh, single-player Scrabble experience customized for beginner and expert players alike
- Fun new Duels and Arena events rewarding tiles you won't want to miss out on
- Enjoy an improved experience with some polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations

Scrabble and word puzzle lovers - prepare for an all-new challenge!
- NEW FEATURE - Word Search!
--- Blends the best of word hunt and anagram puzzles with a Scrabble twist
--- Connect letters to find words, earn bonuses, and win exclusive prizes
- Fun new Duels and Arena events rewarding tiles you won't want to miss out on
- Enjoy an improved experience with more polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations

- Fun new Duels and Arena events rewarding tiles you won't want to miss out on
- Enjoy an improved experience with more polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations

Scrabble lovers get ready for the most exciting Scrabble tiles yet!
- NEW FEATURE - Tile Masters!
--- Take your Scrabble tiles to the next level with new evolving tiles
--- Earn new limited-time currency through the game to cash in our your new tile
- Fun new events rewarding tiles, currency, and much more that you won't want to miss out on
- Enjoy an improved experience with more polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations

Play Scrabble plus even more word puzzle games all in one!
- REFRESH - easier way to find the perfect game mode for you
--- Easily start a Scrabble game with friends and family
--- Navigate to the NEW Event's Lobby and find more fun ways to play
- Fun new Duels and Arena events rewarding tiles you won't want to miss out on
- Enjoy an improved experience with more polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations

- Win big while exploring Puzzle Path like never before
- Don't miss out on daily chests to unlock great prizes

Enjoy a brand new way to challenge you and sharpen your Scrabble skills in Adventures!
- Adventures combines multiple puzzle games into one for an ultimate new game mode you won't want to miss.
--- Make it to the target score in a limited number of tuns to win
--- Play with new board shapes, gold tiles, premium squares, and much more!
- Fun themed Duels, Arena, and Tile Master events to win new tiles!
- Enjoy an improved experience with more polish, bug fixes, and performance optimizations.
